channel.title: Personal on Logs from the Matrix
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Logs from the Matrix

item.title: Starting Again
item.description:
For me, I’m the type of person who says I’m starting something and means it… but actually seeing it through? That part tends to fall off.

I started a blog in the past, posted maybe once or twice, and that was that. Nothing really came of it.

But recently, I’ve been inspired again. A friend of mine, Chris, has been consistently posting contentâ€”mostly about Kubernetes and tech stuff he finds interesting. He even runs a YouTube channel. That’s probably not something I’ll be doing, but seeing his consistency sparked something.
